Posts.Content: See I rarely wear bras, that's the thing. I mean yes my bras rub against it when I do wear them. But I am a stay at home mom and don't really leave the house often so I don't wear bras often. Report
Posts.Title: lump on bra line, Dr dismissed it, extremely worried and need advice.

Posts.Content: I've had a lump on my bra line for a while now. I always just thought it was a part of my chest wall until the other day when I felt it and noticed there was not a bump on the other breast. I called my obgyn and got in for an appointment. She said it was a pimple/sebaceous cyst and she could see it "coming to head". Well, I went home and looked and there was NOTHING. No pimple, no head, no mark, absolutely nothing. This lump is small, a little hard, and painless. I am 20 years old and just got an ultrasound of my breasts done this past June. I am wondering if this could be breast cancer and if I should get a second opinion. I want a biopsy but my husband is telling me I should trust my doctor. I don't know how I could trust her if I don't see a pimple there. It's been there for a while I highly doubt it could be a pimple. Especially since there isn't anything there. I'm so worried and upset right now I have been crying constantly because I am so afraid of this being breast cancer. Please help me. 0 likes, 8 replies Report
Posts.Title: lump on bra line, Dr dismissed it, extremely worried and need advice.

Posts.Content: hi Jenna  is it where bra fits under the breast .. maybe its too tight ... or rubbing .. is it boned bra they can rub in .  jay x Report
